item.title: Jennifer Lopez Makes Jokes About Husband Ben Affleck’s Happy Face
item.dc:creator: Kanishka
item.description:
Introduction Jennifer Lopez recently made light of her husband Ben Affleck’s viral moment at the 2023 GRAMMY Awards, where he was turned into a meme due to his facial expressions. Jennifer Lopez’s Instagram Post Taking to her social media, JLo shared the trailer for Ben Affleck’s upcoming Nike biopic, Air. However, it wasn’t just the […]

Jennifer Lopez Makes Jokes About Husband Ben Affleck’s Happy Face
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

Jennifer Lopez recently made light of her husband Ben Affleck’s viral moment at the 2023 GRAMMY Awards, where he was turned into a meme due to his facial expressions.

Jennifer Lopez’s Instagram Post

Taking to her social media, JLo shared the trailer for Ben Affleck’s upcoming Nike biopic, Air. However, it wasn’t just the trailer that caught everyone’s attention but the thumbnail she used for the Instagram post. Affleck’s character looks somber in the trailer’s thumbnail, while the text JLo wrote reads, “My husband’s happy face.” This indicates that she still took trolls after Affleck went viral for his seemingly less-than-enthusiastic time at this year’s GRAMMY Awards.

 

View this post on Instagram

 

A post shared by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo)

Jennifer and Ben’s Response to the Viral Moment

Following the viral moment, it was reported that Jennifer and Ben both knew about the memes of Ben circulating.

According to Entertainment Tonight, a source said that “she had shown him a few photos that night and he just brushed it off.”

During the GRAMMY Awards, cameras faced Bennifer’s direction as Trevor Noah did a piece before them. Fans saw Affleck whisper something in his wife’s ear, and she responded by turning to face him and lightly tapping his chest as she responded to whatever he told her.

About Ben Affleck’s Upcoming Film, Air

Ben Affleck’s new film follows the history of shoe salesman Sonny Vaccaro and how he led Nike in pursuing the most outstanding athlete in sports history: Michael Jordan. Air also stars Matt Damon, Jason Bateman, Viola Davis, Chris Tucker, and Marlon Wayans. It is scheduled to hit theatres on April 5.

FAQ

What is Jennifer Lopez’s post about?

Jennifer Lopez’s post concerns her husband Ben Affleck’s upcoming Nike biopic, Air.

Why did Jennifer Lopez’s post catch everyone’s attention?

The thumbnail she used for the Instagram post caught everyone’s attention as Affleck’s character looks somber, while her text reads, “My husband’s happy face.”

What is the film Air about?

Air follows the history of shoe salesman Sonny Vaccaro and how he led Nike in pursuing the most outstanding athlete in the history of sports: Michael Jordan.

Source: Lehren

Jennifer Lopez Makes Jokes About Husband Ben Affleck’s Happy Face

item.title: F1’s British Grand Prix Will See Brad Pitt Racing Lewis Hamilton For An Upcoming Movie
item.dc:creator: Kanishka
item.description:
Brad Pitt Gets Green Light to Compete Against Lewis Hamilton in F1 British Grand Prix Brad Pitt, the 59-year-old Hollywood superstar, has reportedly been granted special permission to race against Lewis Hamilton in the upcoming British Grand Prix this summer. The race is part of filming a new F1 Apple movie that Pitt is starring […]

F1’s British Grand Prix Will See Brad Pitt Racing Lewis Hamilton For An Upcoming Movie
item.content:encoded:
Brad Pitt Gets Green Light to Compete Against Lewis Hamilton in F1 British Grand Prix

Brad Pitt, the 59-year-old Hollywood superstar, has reportedly been granted special permission to race against Lewis Hamilton in the upcoming British Grand Prix this summer. The race is part of filming a new F1 Apple movie that Pitt is starring in alongside Damson Idris.

The Sun reported that Pitt would get behind the wheel of a racecar to compete against Hamilton in the first lap of the event. Hamilton, an executive producer on the movie, will also be racing his own car.

Special Permission Granted to Film the Movie During the First Lap of the Race

The movie’s producers were granted special permission to film during the first lap of the race to capture footage of Pitt and Hamilton competing against each other.

F1 CEO Stefano Domenicali recently spoke about the race footage that will happen during the event, saying, “It will be the first movie where they will be within the racing event. It will be quite invasive in terms of production, but it will be another way of showing that F1 never stops.”

Hamilton Hypes Up the Movie

Lewis Hamilton has expressed his excitement for the upcoming F1 Apple movie and is confident it will succeed. He said, “I have such high hopes for it. I know we’re going to make the best racing movie that’s ever existed, both visually, and we’re going to work on making sure we pull on the heartstrings of all those fans.”

British Grand Prix Scheduled for July 7-9 at Silverstone

The British Grand Prix weekend is scheduled from July 7-9 at Silverstone. It is expected to draw a large crowd of F1 fans eager to see their favorite drivers compete on the track.

FAQ

What is the F1 Apple movie?

The F1 Apple movie is an upcoming film that will star Brad Pitt and Damson Idris. The movie will be filmed during the British Grand Prix and is expected to be a significant hit among F1 fans.

When will Brad Pitt race against Lewis Hamilton?

Brad Pitt will race against Lewis Hamilton during the first lap of the British Grand Prix, scheduled from July 7-9 at Silverstone.

What is Lewis Hamilton’s role in the F1 Apple movie?

Lewis Hamilton is an executive producer on the F1 Apple movie and will also be racing his car during the British Grand Prix.

Source: JustJared

F1’s British Grand Prix Will See Brad Pitt Racing Lewis Hamilton For An Upcoming Movie

item.title: Agency Fired Matthew Lawrence After He Allegedly Refused To Strip For Director Offering Him A Marvel Role
item.dc:creator: Kanishka
item.description:
Introduction Matthew Lawrence, an American actor who has appeared in popular TV series like “Boy Meets World” and “Melissa & Joey,” recently shared an incredible experience on his podcast, Brotherly Love. The actor spoke about being offered a role in a Marvel production, but under one condition: he had to strip for the director. Lawrence […]

Agency Fired Matthew Lawrence After He Allegedly Refused To Strip For Director Offering Him A Marvel Role
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

Matthew Lawrence, an American actor who has appeared in popular TV series like “Boy Meets World” and “Melissa & Joey,” recently shared an incredible experience on his podcast, Brotherly Love. The actor spoke about being offered a role in a Marvel production, but under one condition: he had to strip for the director.

Lawrence refused to comply with the director’s request and got fired from his agency. In this article, we delve deeper into Lawrence’s experience and the double standard that exists in Hollywood.

Matthew Lawrence Shares Details About the Incident

During his podcast, Lawrence shared how a prominent Oscar-winning director propositioned him to take off his clothes and take Polaroids off him. The actor was appalled and refused to do it, causing him to lose his agency. Although Lawrence did not mention the name of the director or the exact date when it happened, it’s clear that the experience left him with a sour taste in his mouth.

The Double Standard in Hollywood

Apart from sharing his experience, Lawrence also spoke about the double standard that exists in Hollywood when it comes to sexual harassment. He expressed frustration with how male actors who speak up about sexual harassment are treated compared to female actors. Lawrence pointed out how Terry Crews, who spoke up about being sexually assaulted, was ridiculed and not supported by many people.

“People are laughing at him. People don’t support him. They kick him out. Why? Because he’s a man that represents masculinity, and I think our society is less ready to hear that situation going on with men than they are with women,” Lawrence said.

The actor continued to point out how not many men in Hollywood come out to speak about such incidents, and he believes that the same situation happens to men as well, although it’s probably a third of what women go through.

Conclusion

Matthew Lawrence’s experience highlights the issue of sexual harassment in Hollywood and the double standard that exists when it comes to male actors speaking up about it. Despite the progress made in recent years, it’s clear that there’s still a long way to go to ensure that everyone is treated equally and with respect in the entertainment industry.

FAQs

Who is Matthew Lawrence?

Matthew Lawrence is an American actor known for his roles in popular television series such as “Boy Meets World” and “Melissa & Joey.”

What happened to Matthew Lawrence?

Matthew Lawrence revealed on his Brotherly Love podcast that he was offered a role in a Marvel production, but only if he agreed to strip for the director. He refused and lost his agency as a result.

Did Matthew Lawrence name the director who made the request?

No, Matthew Lawrence did not name the director or provide any specific details about when the incident occurred.

What double standard did Matthew Lawrence mention during the podcast?

Matthew Lawrence expressed his frustration with the double standard that exists in Hollywood when it comes to male actors and sexual harassment. He stated that society is less ready to hear about these situations happening to men than women.

Source: Deadline

Agency Fired Matthew Lawrence After He Allegedly Refused To Strip For Director Offering Him A Marvel Role

item.title: Demon Slayer Season 3 Last Episode: When will the Anime End?
item.dc:creator: Kanishka
item.description:
Demon Slayer Season 3 began airing on Crunchyroll on April 9th this year. Fans of the popular anime series are eager to know when the anime series will end. Well, we have got the latest scoop for all you avid fans out there. Fans of Demon Slayer can’t get enough of the series’ thrilling plotline. […]

Demon Slayer Season 3 Last Episode: When will the Anime End?
item.content:encoded:
Demon Slayer Season 3 began airing on Crunchyroll on April 9th this year. Fans of the popular anime series are eager to know when the anime series will end. Well, we have got the latest scoop for all you avid fans out there. Fans of Demon Slayer can’t get enough of the series’ thrilling plotline.

Demon Slayer Season 3 Finale Date Revealed!

The Demon Slayer Season 3 last episode release date has been announced officially by Crunchyroll. The last episode is expected to air on 25th June 2023.

The “Thank You, Tokito” episode will air today, 30th April 2023, on Crunchyroll. The episode’s plotline is out, and fans can’t wait to have it on their screens.

When it comes to the Demon Slayer Season 3 finale episode release timing, then it will vary depending on the region.

  • Indian Standard Time: 25th June 2023, 19:45 JST
  • Japanese Standard Time: 25th June 2023, 23:15 JST
  • Eastern Standard Time: 25th June 2023, 10:15 JST
  • British Summer Time: 25th June 2023, 15:15 JST

Now, since 3 episodes have already been premiered and one episode will premiere today, there will be 8 more episodes left in the anime series to premiere.

The first season of Demon Slayer had about 26 episodes which covered 54 chapters of the manga series. While season 2 covered chapters 55 to 97 of the manga series.

New episodes of Demon Slayer Season 3 will have a weekly release scheduled, coming out every Sunday at about 11:15 PM JST.

Predictions for Demon Slayer Season 3 Epic Conclusion

Season 3 Plotline is Out on the InternetThose who have read the manga of Demon Slayer would probably already know what’s coming up next in the series. While the fans of the anime series will still have to wait since the plot for the finale episode is not yet revealed by the makers.

Where to Watch Demon Slayer Season 3 Last Episode Online?

Japanese fans of the anime series will be able to watch Demon Slayer Season 3 last episode on Disney Plus. While international fans can tune into Crunchyroll to watch the last episode of the series.

Demon Slayer Season 3 Last Episode: When will the Anime End?

item.title: One Piece Episode 1060 Watch Online LEGALLY, Release Date, Time, Preview, Watch Online, and More
item.dc:creator: Kanishka
item.description:
One Piece Episode 1060 is set to air this weekend. The preview for the upcoming installment of One Piece has already been revealed, and after knowing what’s coming up next in the series, fans are eagerly waiting for episode 1060. One Piece Episode 1060 Release Date Scheduled for This Sunday One Piece Episode 1060 will […]

One Piece Episode 1060 Watch Online LEGALLY, Release Date, Time, Preview, Watch Online, and More
item.content:encoded:
One Piece Episode 1060 is set to air this weekend. The preview for the upcoming installment of One Piece has already been revealed, and after knowing what’s coming up next in the series, fans are eagerly waiting for episode 1060.

One Piece Episode 1060 Release Date Scheduled for This Sunday

One Piece Episode 1060 will be released this Sunday, April 30th, 2023. The release timing for episode 1060 is 9:30 AM as per Japan Standard Time. But the release time will be different for different countries of the world.

  • Pacific Standard Time: 6:00 pm, Saturday, April 29
  • Greenwich Standard Time: 2:00 am, Sunday, April 30
  • Indian Standard Time: 7:30 am, Sunday, April 30
  • Japanese Standard Time: 11:00 am, Sunday, April 30
  • Eastern Standard Time: 9:00 pm, Saturday, April 29
  • Central European Time: 3:00 am, Sunday, April 30
  • Philippine Standard Time: 10:00 am, Sunday, April 30
  • Australia Central Standard Time: 11:30 am, Sunday, April 30

Episode 1060 will be streaming online on Funimation and Crunchyroll. The upcoming installment will be a long one with about 90 minutes of duration.

After 1 year!~ I'm back to be working on One Piece !
On Episode #1059.
Really Thankful for ''Tu Yong-Ce'' for such opportunity ! And the PA Shiraishi-san for being patience with me.

More to come in the future ^_^
Hope you guys get to enjoy it !!#ONEPIECE #ONEPIECE1059 pic.twitter.com/vp1nacc9kq

— Vann Oba・( Available for work )✨ (@Vann_Oba) April 22, 2023

Is There A Trailer Out for One Piece Episode 1060?

No, there is no trailer out for One Piece episode 1060.

What Happened in the Episode 1059 of One Piece?

In episode 1059, we witnessed that several people attacked Kazenbo, but it didn’t work. Yamato finds out that she is in a race with Kazenbo to the armory.

The episode shifted, and CP0 was still in the chase for Nico Robin and Brook, but X Drake and Scratchmen Apoo distracted them.

The episode ended with Zoro realizing that both his swords were made by the same person, Shimotsuki Kozaburo.

Zoro faces his toughest adversity in King! Catch the next episode of #OnePiece (#1059), premiering tonight on simulcast streaming! ⚔️🏴‍☠️🔥 pic.twitter.com/oXaYJ6SGzq

— Toei Animation (@ToeiAnimation) April 22, 2023

What to Expect From One Piece Episode 1060? The Plotline

The upcoming installment will focus on the flashback story of Shimotsuki Kozaburo and Zoro. We will find out who he is and why he is important in the story. The upcoming episode will also explain why Enma is so powerful.

Where to Watch Episode 1060 of One Piece Online?

Episode 1060 will be streaming online on Crunchyroll and Funimation. Fans can tune into any of these two platforms to watch the episode online.

One Piece Episode 1060 Watch Online LEGALLY, Release Date, Time, Preview, Watch Online, and More

item.title: Jada Pinkett Smith’s Red Table Talk gets “canceled” by Facebook despite high-profile guests
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith’s situation has taken over the internet and social media sites. It has also become the talk of the town, especially after Will Smith’s antics at the 94th Academy Awards. Both of them were open about their marriage, and the fact that Jada Pinkett Smith admitted to having an affair […]

Jada Pinkett Smith’s Red Table Talk gets “canceled” by Facebook despite high-profile guests
item.content:encoded:
Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith’s situation has taken over the internet and social media sites. It has also become the talk of the town, especially after Will Smith’s antics at the 94th Academy Awards. Both of them were open about their marriage, and the fact that Jada Pinkett Smith admitted to having an affair with someone else has become a big deal.

Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith are both great actors who have made many blockbusters and big-money movies when they were at their best. Will Smith is one of the most famous actors of all time and one of the richest people in Hollywood. Pinkett Smith, on the other hand, is one of the 100 most powerful people in the world in 2021.

Red Table Talk, Jada Pinkett Smith’s talk show, was recently canceled by Facebook, and fans took to social media right away to talk about it.

 

Jada Pinkett Smith’s Red Table TalkCanceled By Facebook.

Jada Pinkett Smith is a pretty big name in Hollywood. She has made her name in the business by starring in several blockbuster movies and franchises, most notably The Matrix franchise. During her time in Hollywood, she has worked with many well-known actors and actresses. This helped her build a name for herself in the business, and it wasn’t long before she became well-known. Her talk show, Red Table Talk, which was hosted by Facebook Watch, was one of the best ways for her fans and followers all over the world to be entertained. It also gave famous Hollywood stars like Demi Moore, Sandra Bullock, Kelly Osbourne, and Ireland Baldwin a chance to appear on the show.

The show’s cancellation came as a surprise, but it wasn’t too much of a surprise since it was the last Facebook Original show. Facebook has stopped making shows and is now focusing on VR experiences. Even though there have been reports that the team is looking for a platform for their show, nothing has changed in this area.

In recent years, Red Table Talk has played an important role by bringing famous people to the show and solving a lot of mysteries. The show, which is run by Jada Pinkett Smith, her daughter Willow Smith, and her mother Adrienne Banfield-Norris, has been a lot of fun lately, especially after what happened with Will Smith and Chris Rock, but alas!

 

Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith’s Situation.

There are always bumps in Hollywood relationships, and some don’t just have small bumps; their whole relationship is a bump. This was the case with Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith, who have been together for 25 years. They were in a bad situation, but not in the same way as Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt or Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. Because of their fame, the situation was more tense than it should have been, and the constant jokes and rumors about their marriage made it even worse.

Will Smith was banned from the Academy Awards for a whole decade because of the controversy at the Oscars. This was something that had never happened before. As usual, the issue blew up on social media. Some people said it was romantic that Smith stood up for his wife without thinking twice, while others said he was crazy and expected him to take the high road because of his power and influence in the industry. After the short fight between actor Will Smith and comedian Chris Rock, officials wanted to help the actor leave the event, but they were told otherwise.

Both Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith have been accused of cheating by each other, and every time their story made it to social media, it was turned into a typical drama. There were rumors that Will Smith had an affair with Margot Robbie, a popular actress in Hollywood. However, both Will Smith and Margot Robbie denied the rumors right away. August Alsina and Jada Pinkett Smith had a relationship that was kept secret until it could no longer be hidden. Alsina was a friend of her son, Jaden Smith. She met Alsina in 2015 at the London Music Festival.

Jada Pinkett Smith’s Red Table Talk gets “canceled” by Facebook despite high-profile guests

item.title: Disney and other major studios get $30 million from illegal streaming sites amid piracy crackdown
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
The owner of two illegal streaming sites was fined $30 million by a group of the biggest movie and TV studios. According to court documents filed on March 27, the studios and defendant Dwayne Johnson (no relation to the actor) reached a deal to end the lawsuit. The deal includes an injunction that prevents him […]

Disney and other major studios get $30 million from illegal streaming sites amid piracy crackdown
item.content:encoded:
The owner of two illegal streaming sites was fined $30 million by a group of the biggest movie and TV studios.

According to court documents filed on March 27, the studios and defendant Dwayne Johnson (no relation to the actor) reached a deal to end the lawsuit. The deal includes an injunction that prevents him from continuing to run any service that lets users steal movies.

 

In December 2021, Universal, Disney, and Netflix all sued Johnson for stealing their ideas. Others, like Universal, Warner Bros., Paramount, and Apple, also joined the lawsuit.

The amount of piracy was “massive,” the complaint says. Johnson ran two services, AllAccessTV (AATV) and Quality Restreams, that sold subscriptions to copyrighted movies and TV shows, like Harry Potter, Jurassic Park, and The Office, through thousands of live channels and video-on-demand options. Users could watch major networks like HBO, Cinemax, and NBC through the live channel feed. Customers could put the platforms on their devices by downloading them.

The settlement comes at a time when studios and production companies are taking more and more people to court for violating their copyright by streaming content illegally. In September, Voltage Pictures and other owners of copyrights settled three lawsuits against internet service providers for not kicking out customers who pirated their movies over and over again. Copyright law is what intellectual property owners use most to fight illegal streaming.

Access to VOD was included in subscription plans for an extra $15 per month on top of the $25 base plan. It put content into many different categories, one of which was the streaming service where the movie or TV show was shown.

The suit said that Johnson knew what he was doing was wrong. It said that he was trying to hide his illegal business by using a website that looks like it sells VPN software but really sells subscriptions to his services. If copyright is broken on purpose, the owner can get statutory damages of up to $150,000 per work that was stolen.

The complaint says that Johnson made $3 million a year from AATV.

Disney and other major studios get $30 million from illegal streaming sites amid piracy crackdown

item.title: Johnny Depp was nearly fired from ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ for making Captain Jack Sparrow ‘too gay’
item.dc:creator: Akash
item.description:
There are few guarantees in life like a box office hit for a Johnny Depp-led Pirates of the Caribbean film. Fans have laughed and bought tickets for Depp’s various portrayals of Jack Sparrow, with each film generating a lot of money at the box office. But did you know Johnny Depp was almost dismissed from […]

Johnny Depp was nearly fired from ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ for making Captain Jack Sparrow ‘too gay’
item.content:encoded:
There are few guarantees in life like a box office hit for a Johnny Depp-led Pirates of the Caribbean film. Fans have laughed and bought tickets for Depp’s various portrayals of Jack Sparrow, with each film generating a lot of money at the box office. But did you know Johnny Depp was almost dismissed from the first film in the series by Disney? Johnny Depp later stated that it would have been for a rather embarrassing cause.

Johnny Depp’s brilliant acting career

For nearly 30 years, Johnny Depp has been one of Hollywood’s most famous and sought-after actors. Depp is well-known for his chameleon-like ability to adapt himself to various roles. Early in his career, he appeared in the drama What’s Eating Gilbert Grape, but he is best known for playing the eccentric lead role in Edward Scissorhands. Since then, he’s portrayed nearly every type of character imaginable, including:

  • The eccentric Willy Wonka
  • The Mad Hatter from Alice in Wonderland
  • Mobster Whitey Bulger
  • The drug dealer George Jung
  • The voice of a cartoon lizard in Rango
  • The evil wizard Grindelwald in the Harry Potter universe

It is apparent that Johnny Depp has a wide range. He’s played an exceptionally diverse range of characters. Depp has also starred in several successful blockbusters and franchises. None of the franchises has done as well as Pirates of the Caribbean.

How Johnny Depp made ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ a worldwide phenomenon

Johnny Depp plays Jack Sparrow in the Pirates of the Caribbean film series. Based on Rolling Stones guitarist Keith Richards, Sparrow is a hard-drinking, scatterbrained pirate with a strong moral compass. Sparrow’s experiences bring him into contact with a wide range of good and bad personalities.

Many characters appear to have a history with Sparrow, as they are frequently unhappy to see him again. Depp plays Sparrow with a physicality reminiscent of Buster Keaton. He also has the mischievous spirit of Bugs Bunny in him. All of this adds up to Sparrow being one of the most memorable characters from a recent movie trilogy.

The Pirates’ flicks have all been enormous box-office successes. According to Box Office Mojo, none of the five films in the series have earned less than $172 million. The highest-grossing film in the franchise was Dead Man’s Chest, which grossed $423 million.

While the films are full of colorful characters, exciting action, and brilliantly filmed set pieces, there is no doubt about who drives their success. People keep coming back to see Depp’s Sparrow.

The time Johnny Depp was nearly fired from ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’

While it’s difficult to imagine anyone other than Depp in the role of Captain Jack, Disney executives almost fired him. Before the film was released, some Disney executives were concerned about Depp’s portrayal of Jack Sparrow.

Michael Eisner, then-CEO of Disney, was particularly perplexed. In an online interview, Depp revealed that he was almost fired for making the role too “gay.”

“Yeah, they wanted to fire me…It trickled back to me that [former Disney CEO] Michael Eisner went on some sort of bent about how ‘G*dd*mnit Johnny Depp’s ruining the film! Is it drunk? Is it gay?’ So I fully expected to be fired.”

Johnny Depp embraced the criticism, assuring the studio executives that all of his characters were gay. Of course, he wasn’t fired, and both Disney and Depp profited handsomely. It just goes to show that Hollywood executives who consider themselves to be creative should probably leave filmmaking to the artists. What’s wrong with Captain Sparrow being gay?

Johnny Depp was nearly fired from ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ for making Captain Jack Sparrow ‘too gay’

Fans have laughed and bought tickets for Depp's various portrayals of Jack Sparrow, with each film generating a lot of money at the box office. But did you know Johnny Depp was almost dismissed from the first film in the series by Disney? Johnny Depp later stated that it would have been for a rather embarrassing cause.

item.title: Will Smith decided to be an actor because his first girlfriend cheated on him
item.dc:creator: Akash
item.description:
Everyone has their own motives for choosing a profession, but some are stranger than others. Will Smith, one of the world’s most bankable actors, had an unusual motivation for becoming an actor. Smith was apparently inspired to become famous after his first lover cheated on him. And, while it’s hardly the healthiest motive to want […]

Will Smith decided to be an actor because his first girlfriend cheated on him
item.content:encoded:
Everyone has their own motives for choosing a profession, but some are stranger than others. Will Smith, one of the world’s most bankable actors, had an unusual motivation for becoming an actor.

Smith was apparently inspired to become famous after his first lover cheated on him. And, while it’s hardly the healthiest motive to want success, it’s worked for Smith.

Will Smith is one of the biggest actors in the world.

Smith is one of the most successful actors in film history. He has a net worth of approximately $350 million after appearing in hit films such as Men in Black, Independence Day, and Alladin. According to Forbes, his films have grossed over $3.5 billion in total, with Alladin alone grossing over $1 billion.

Every summer in the 2000s, it was difficult not to see Smith’s face in a blockbuster picture. Although he dazzled audiences with more mainstream films early in his career, he shifted his focus to deeper, more complex roles as his career progressed. Films like Seven Pounds, The Pursuit of Happiness, and Concussion showcased Smith’s versatility as an actor.

Smith reprises his role as Mike Lowry, a Miami police officer, opposite Martin Lawrence in his most recent picture, Bad Boys for Life. According to Box Office Mojo, Smith’s latest film, Bad Boys for Life, grossed over $426 million.

Will Smith’s cheating ex-girlfriend inspired him to become a famous actor

While many actors claim to have chosen their profession because they enjoy the craft, Smith had a different motivation. In a previous interview with The Hollywood Reporter, he said that his passion for acting stemmed from adolescent heartbreak.

“When I was 15 years old, my first girlfriend cheated on me,” Smith said. “And I remember making a decision that nobody would ever cheat on me again. And the way I was gonna do that was by being the biggest actor on Earth.”

Smith knows that his motives and reasoning for becoming an actor are illogical. In reality, his feelings are more about relying on success to validate himself than about his ex-girlfriend.

“So, there’s been this weird psychology that I’ve always felt, like, if my movies are number one, my life is gonna work out great.”

Will Smith is happily married today.

Despite the fact that an unfaithful girlfriend helped launch his career, Smith has already moved on. He is now married to Jada Pinkett-Smith, whom he has been married to since 1997. Jaden and Willow Smith, the couple’s children, are also actors and musicians.


Jada Pinkett Smith admitted to having an “entanglement” with August Alsina earlier this year, which sparked some controversy. However, they revealed during a Red Table Talk interview that Alsina and Pinkett-Smith’s connection occurred when she and Will were separated.

 

Will Smith decided to be an actor because his first girlfriend cheated on him

item.title: Jerry Seinfeld defends his relationship with “21 years younger” allegedly “underage” Shoshanna Lonstein, says he found her “intelligent”
item.dc:creator: Simranjit
item.description:
Jerry Seinfeld is well-known for his role in the sitcom Seinfeld, in which he plays a semi-fictionalized version of his stand-up career and life. The sitcom, which he and Larry David made and wrote, ran for nine seasons and 180 episodes and was a big hit. In 1998, he met his wife, Jessica. Before that, […]

Jerry Seinfeld defends his relationship with “21 years younger” allegedly “underage” Shoshanna Lonstein, says he found her “intelligent”
item.content:encoded:
Jerry Seinfeld is well-known for his role in the sitcom Seinfeld, in which he plays a semi-fictionalized version of his stand-up career and life. The sitcom, which he and Larry David made and wrote, ran for nine seasons and 180 episodes and was a big hit.

In 1998, he met his wife, Jessica. Before that, he was in a with Shoshanna Lonstein Gruss, a 17-year-old high school senior, in a relationship that caused a lot of trouble. Jerry Seinfeld was 21 years older than her when they met in Central Park in New York City in May 1993.

 

Jerry Seinfeld on Dating a 21-Year Younger Woman.

It looks like the age difference between them didn’t bother them.

I met this girl, Shoshanna,

the comedian told Playboy in a 1993 interview.

She’s a very sweet girl and she’s very pretty. I didn’t know how old she was — I knew she wasn’t 40,

Jerry Seinfeld revealed.

I took her to a basketball game and that was the whole thing,

he added.

Jerry Seinfeld’s relationship with a teenager drew a lot of attention. Howard Stern, who is known for his talk show, The Howard Stern Show, asked the comedian some rude questions about their relationship.

So you sit in Central Park and have a candy bar on a string and pull it when the girls come?

Responding to Stern, Seinfeld said,

I didn’t realize she was so young. This is the only girl I ever went out with who was that young. I wasn’t dating her. We just went to a restaurant, and that was it.

 

Jerry Seinfeld and Shoshanna’s Four Years Long Relationship.

Seinfeld was always quick to defend his controversial relationship with Gruss.

I am not an idiot,

he said defending the relationship.

Shoshanna is a person, not an age. She is extremely bright. She’s funny, sharp, very alert. We just get along. You can hear the click.

At the time, reports said that the couple first said they were “just friends” and didn’t tell anyone about their relationship until Gruss turned 18.

George Wallace, a comedian and close friend of Seinfeld, told People that she was beautiful and mature and that “she’s good for him.” Seinfeld’s manager at the time, George Shapiro also said,

I’ve never seen him happier.

Further, Jerry Seinfeld told Playboy,

I don’t meet that many women I like, period. So when I like someone, I don’t care about her race, creed, or national origin. If I like her, I don’t care. I don’t discriminate. If she’s 18, if she’s intelligent, that’s fine.

After dating for four years, the couple broke up in 1997. According to the news, there was no fight between the two. Gruss went to UCLA, and as Seinfeld worked more and more in Los Angeles, the distance between them grew. In the end, her lifestyle couldn’t keep up with the comedian’s busy schedule.

I wanted to run around and play,

she said.

Gruss said that she was happy with the relationship, but it didn’t work out because they lived far apart.

 

Where is Shoshanna Lonstein Now?

After they broke up, Gruss got a job as a fashion designer. She then came up with the idea of “clothes with more inclusivity” for her first collection, which came out in 1998 under her own name. In 2003, she married Joshua Gruss, who ran a record label. They have a daughter named Sienna and twin boys named Joseph and Angelica. 2014 was also the year that the Gruss couple broke up. It was “amicable and sad.”

She wrote on Instagram in 2021 that she was writing a book about her life called “The Fabric of My Life.” Now, she is busy with her business and social media, where she often posts photos of her children and items from her collection.

Jerry Seinfeld defends his relationship with “21 years younger” allegedly “underage” Shoshanna Lonstein, says he found her “intelligent”
